column3: ## Test Public Search Results Display: Articles
Go to the DOAJ search page at /search/articles

column4: Only articles are shown in the results

column3: Look at the first article in your search results

column4: You are taken to the DOAJ article page for this article

column3: Click back in your browser window to return to the search results

column4: You are taken to the DOAJ ToC for the journal which opens in a new tab

column3: Click on "Abstract" where the article has an abstract

column4: The abstract appears beneath the article search results
You are taken to the full text of this article on the Web. It opens in a new tab
focus is on the list of checkboxes
focus is clearly marked by the outline

column3: click spacebar to check the filter
